title: 은유 표현 - 상황 은유
description: 복잡한 상황을 효과적인 은유로 설명하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: Right now, we're standing at a crossroads.
This project is just taking its first steps.
I think there's a crack in our relationship.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 상황 은유 표현 구사

sentences.en: Right now, we're standing at a crossroads.

sentences.kr: 이 프로젝트는 이제 막 첫걸음을 뗀 거야.
sentences.en: This project is just taking its first steps.

sentences.kr: 우리 관계에 균열이 생긴 것 같아.
sentences.en: I think there's a crack in our relationship.
This problem is like a ticking time bomb.

sentences.kr: 그 사람은 늘 벽을 쌓고 있어.
sentences.en: That person is always building walls.

sentences.kr: 새로운 시작을 위해 다리를 놓고 있어.
sentences.en: We're building bridges for a new beginning.

sentences.kr: 이 상황은 미로 같아서 출구를 찾기 힘들어.
sentences.en: This situation is like a maze - it's hard to find the exit.
We're all in the same boat, you know.
